title: High Noon Jhin Recall animation
body: Occasionally when I recall as High Noon Jhin, the last bottle he shoots (not the mug) teleports to his feet before he shoots at it, and stays there for the remainder of the animation, unbroken. Happens most often when facing west while recalling. No screenshots unfortunately.

replies.body:
Hey Galactan! 

I took a look into this and it appears that if Jhin is reloading during his recall animation, the green bottle will appear at his feet.

Thanks for the report - we'll get this resolved! ^-^
On the regular skin, while recalling, if there is a reload queued up the gun will teleport from the long barrel to his hand and he will perform the reload animation mid-back. Intentional?
Appears to be a similar issue - I've tossed it along to champion to take a look at.
